name: YATOTW.exe
description:
▒▓▒▒▒░░▒▒▓▒▒░▒▒▓▒▒▒▒▒▓░▒▒▒░▒▒
You, on a predefined path: "That green, brown, gray dank" ▓▒▒░▒░░░▒▒▒▓▒▒▒▒▒▒░▒▒▒▓▒░▒▒░▒
YATOTW.exe was made for an exhibition.

Perfect setup would be:

Wii Balance Board accompanied by the Wii Balance Walker programm (you can find it here: http://www.greycube.com/site/download.php?view.68 )

a short distance beamer

some good speakers for sound

You may also play without this setup on your pc.

I recommend playing with headphones.
Expect a low FPS.

Controlls.

Just go with the flow and press "w" to move on. Use "shift" for more energetic walking. This is needed to climb hills.

Sound by Elko Braas aka Thin foil resistor (soundcloud)

Original tree models by Kim Larsen aka "kim" ( tf3d account)

Wii Balance Walker by Richard Perry ( greycube project)
